lead_paragraph: Liverpool goalkeeper Simon Mignolet is optimistic that the Anfield crowd can inspire another Europa League fightback when they host Spanish side Villarreal in the second leg of their semi-final on Thursday.

headline.print_headline: Mignolet Hopes Anfield Roar Can Inspire Another Comeback
headline.main: Mignolet Hopes Anfield Roar Can Inspire Another Comeback

snippet: Liverpool goalkeeper Simon Mignolet is optimistic that the Anfield crowd can inspire another Europa League fightback when they host Spanish side Villarreal in the second leg of their semi-final on Thursday....
